import React, { useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', instagram: '' }); const [ showSocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs ] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, instagram } = formData; const onChange = event => { setFormData({ ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } return (

onChange(event)} /> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(event)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(event)}/> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(event)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself

)} Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { } export default CreateProfile
